segments.text: Looking at this scene, I notice the woman focused on her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate so carefully with her towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet is running full blast behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is spilling over the sink edge like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and forming a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea her foot is wet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the kids are up to something over by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on that shaky two-step stool, stretching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar, looking so determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't give way and he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a real mess in seconds.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why hasn't anyone noticed the water yet?
segments.speaker: PAR
